description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. In Project Delta you are a pioneering space captain with only a small shuttlecraft and a bit of money to your name, but you have a strong sense of destiny as your journey awaits.  - Experience over 60 Weapons, Upgrades and Ships. - Take part in large scale and small scale battles. - Explore the solar system and the asteroid field. - Become a pirate, a trader, a miner or whatever you want...
description.short: In Project Delta you are a pioneering space captain with only a small shuttlecraft and a bit of money to your name, but you have a strong sense of destiny as your journey awaits.  - Experience over 60 Weapons, Upgrades and Ships. - Take part in large scale and small scale battles. - Explore the solar system and the asteroid field. - Become a pirate, a trader, a miner or whatever you want...
